mapper.select: SELECT p.hospital_id, p.Purchase_number, p.Purchase_name, p.descrip_id, p.start_time, p.over_time, p.activate_time, p.submit_time, p.assessor_time, t.order_quantity, t.order_amount, t.delivery_volume, t.delivery_amount, t.`return_number`, t.settlement_number, t.settlement_amount FROM `purchase` p LEFT JOIN transaction_info t ON p.pi_id = t.pi_id

SELECT * FROM purchase p, transaction_info t
AND Purchase_number LIKE concat('%',#{purchaseNumber},'%')
AND Purchase_name LIKE concat('%',#{purchaseName},'%')
AND hospital_id LIKE concat('%',#{hospitalId},'%')

SELECT p.`pi_id`, p.`Purchase_number`, p.`Purchase_name`, h.`hospital_name`, p.`descrip_id`, p.`start_time`, p.`over_time`, p.`activate_time`, p.`submit_time`, p.`assessor_time`, ti.`order_amount`, ti.`order_quantity` FROM purchase p LEFT JOIN hospital h ON p.`hospital_id`=h.`hospital_id` LEFT JOIN transaction_info ti ON p.`pi_id`= ti.`pi_id`

SELECT p.`pi_id`, p.`Purchase_number`, p.`Purchase_name`, h.`hospital_name`, p.`descrip_id`, p.`start_time`, p.`over_time`, p.`activate_time`, p.`submit_time`, p.`assessor_time`, ti.`order_amount`, ti.`order_quantity` FROM purchase p,hospital h, transaction_info ti WHERE p.`hospital_id`=h.`hospital_id` AND p.`pi_id`= ti.`pi_id`
and p.Purchase_number like concat('%',#{purchaseNumber},'%')
and p.Purchase_name like concat('%',#{purchaseName},'%')
and h.hospital_name like concat('%',#{hospitalName},'%')

SELECT p.pi_id, s.Supplier_name, p.descrip_id, ti.order_quantity, ti.order_amount, ti.delivery_volume, ti.delivery_amount, ti.return_number, ti.return_amount, ti.settlement_number, ti.settlement_amount FROM purchase p LEFT JOIN transaction_info ti ON p.pi_id=ti.ti_id LEFT JOIN supplier s ON p.supplier_id=s.Supplier_id

SELECT p.pi_id, s.Supplier_name, p.descrip_id, ti.order_quantity, ti.order_amount, ti.delivery_volume, ti.delivery_amount, ti.return_number, ti.return_amount, ti.settlement_number, ti.settlement_amount FROM purchase p LEFT JOIN transaction_info ti ON p.pi_id=ti.ti_id LEFT JOIN supplier s ON p.supplier_id=s.Supplier_id WHERE s.supplier_id = #{supplierId};

SELECT p.pi_id, h.`hospital_name`, p.descrip_id, r.`receipt`, r.`receipt_money`, ti.order_quantity, ti.order_amount, ti.return_number, ti.return_amount, ti.settlement_number, ti.settlement_amount FROM purchase p LEFT JOIN transaction_info ti ON p.pi_id=ti.ti_id LEFT JOIN hospital h ON p.`hospital_id`=h.`hospital_id` LEFT JOIN repertory r ON p.`repertory_id`=r.`repertory_id`

SELECT p.pi_id, h.`hospital_name`, p.descrip_id, r.`receipt`, r.`receipt_money`, ti.order_quantity, ti.order_amount, ti.return_number, ti.return_amount, ti.settlement_number, ti.settlement_amount FROM purchase p LEFT JOIN transaction_info ti ON p.pi_id=ti.ti_id LEFT JOIN hospital h ON p.`hospital_id`=h.`hospital_id` LEFT JOIN repertory r ON p.`repertory_id`=r.`repertory_id` where 1=1
and h.hospital_name like concat('%',#{hospitalName},'%')

SELECT p.`pi_id`, p.`descrip_id`, dis.`drug_serial_number`, dis.`generic_drug`, dis.`trade_name`, dis.`dosage_form`, dis.`specification`, u.`units`, dis.`conversion_factor`, e.`enterprise_name`, ti.`order_quantity`, ti.`order_amount`, r.`receipt`, r.`receipt_money` FROM purchase p LEFT JOIN drug_information_sheet dis ON p.drug_id= dis.`drug_id` LEFT JOIN units u ON dis.`units` = u.`units_id` LEFT JOIN enterprise e ON e.`enterprise_id`= dis.`enterprise_id` LEFT JOIN repertory r ON p.`repertory_id`=r.`repertory_id` LEFT JOIN transaction_info ti ON ti.`pi_id`= p.`pi_id`

SELECT p.`pi_id`, p.`descrip_id`, dis.`drug_serial_number`, dis.`generic_drug`, dis.`trade_name`, dis.`dosage_form`, dis.`specification`, u.`units`, dis.`conversion_factor`, e.`enterprise_name`, ti.`order_quantity`, ti.`order_amount`, r.`receipt`, r.`receipt_money` FROM purchase p LEFT JOIN drug_information_sheet dis ON p.drug_id= dis.`drug_id` LEFT JOIN units u ON dis.`units` = u.`units_id` LEFT JOIN enterprise e ON e.`enterprise_id`= dis.`enterprise_id` LEFT JOIN repertory r ON p.`repertory_id`=r.`repertory_id` LEFT JOIN transaction_info ti ON ti.`pi_id`= p.`pi_id` where 1=1
